original_text:
It is not only the old who are wise,
    not only the aged who understand what is right.
korean_text: 어른이라고 지혜롭거나 노인이라고 정의를 깨닫는 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: It is not only the old who are wise
not only the aged who understand what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 올바른 것을 이해하는 것은 장로들만이 아니다
